title: Sea Serpent
text: All trains on ships within 15 mileposts of Opal Bezin lose 1 turn and 1 load.

title: Rainbow Bridge
text: A Rainbow Bridge is discovered between Bluefeld and Octomare. These two cities are magically connected for the rest of the game.

title: Peasants are Revolting
text: No pickups or deliveries at any city more than 3 mileposts from the coast.

title: Sand Storm
text: All track connected to desert mileposts in the Orc Wastes is destroyed but may be rebuilt. All trains on desert mileposts return to last city and lose 1 turn and 1 load.

title: Volcanoes Erupt, Causing Free Dragon Attacks
text: All trains within 2 mileposts of a volcano lose all loads and 1 turn. All trains within 10 mileposts of Nordkassel lose 1 load and 1 turn. No rail building allowed in this area.

title: Rogue Magic
text: Work Crew is enchanted.  No rail building by drawing player.  No player may exchange foremen.

title: Ice Storm
text: All trains within 10 mileposts of Kola move at half rate. No rail building or movement in mountain mileposts in this area.

title: Elven Antirailroad Activists Attack
text: No railbuilding or movement on forest mileposts in Glyth Gamel and Silvarre.

title: Flood
text: Rivers in the Olde World flood. All bridges are destroyed, but may be rebuilt.

title: Pirates
text: Pirates attack, seize booty. All trains on ships lose 1 turn and 1 load.

title: Evil Prince Summons Warlord
text: All trains in Bright lose 1 turn and 1 load.

title: Barbarians Attack
text: No Pickups or deliveries within 3 mileposts of a jungle milepost.

title: Winged Demons Escape
text: All trains in Orc Wastes, Iron Holm, Eusarch, Caicenden are attacked by winged demons and lose 1 turn and 1 load.

title: Wizards Strike
text: Magical connection between Wikkedde and Ozu-Zarkh and the Rainbow Bridge is suspended for one turn. No train may be upgraded.

title: Siren Song Seaman Enchanted
text: All trains on ships within 15 mileposts of Ilik-Herb lose 1 turn and 1 load

title: Magic Tempest
text: All trains in the Olde World move at half rate.  No movement or building in mountain and alpine mileposts in this area.

title: Hurricane
text: All trains in Janoshal and Wislandor move at half rate. No Movement or building in mountain and alpine mileposts in this area.

title: Flood
text: The Nestor, Bright, Green, and Nairnkyl rivers flood. All bridges over these rivers are destroyed, but may be rebuilt.

title: Flood
text: The Caetish, River of Death, Ssylvan, and Juul rivers flood. All bridges over these rivers are destroyed, but may be rebuilt.
